title: Looking for Commited Gold+ Players- available 4 hours a day.
body:
If you play more than 4 hours a day and are committed to becoming a professional gamer then message me. 
IGN: burstfire301.

At the moment we have a Plat ADC, Gold Support and myself as Gold Top Lane. Anyone Platinum or above will be instantly given a place (providing their role is open). If you play one of the 3 roles already taken, don't worry. We are offering 3 spots for subs. This is also perfect for anyone who doesn't main one role and just likes being part of a team.

replies.body:
Gold II, mains Mid and Supp.
I have added you.
Gold 5, Main ADC, Mid and Jungle and can rotate happily between them. I am also available alot as I have graduated.
I'm gold 5, main mid. IGN: HW Chungis
I AM A COMMlTTED GOLD+  PLAYER WHO IS AVAILABLE FOR FOUR HOURS A DAY

> I AM A COMMlTTED GOLD+  PLAYER WHO IS AVAILABLE FOR FOUR HOURS A DAY

Only four?
Well more, but he said only 4

IGN : CC Authentic
Age : 15 but Mature.
Best To Worst Roles : 
Mid > ADC > Jungle > Support > Top
Season  3 and 4 Ranks :
Bronze 2 in S3, And Silver 2 in S4 , however I do believe I am better, and would love to try out.

Availability : 4-5 hours a day 4pm till 10pm most days.

Internet Provider : Telstra Unlimited

I have all communication methods including Teamspeak and Skype if needed.

Thanks!
I would like to join the team although i am not the highest rank i would like to show you my skill and determination that every team needs. LegendAzz
